text: Alexander Payer (born 12 September 1989) is an Austrian snowboarder. He competed in the 2017 FIS Snowboard World Championships, and in the 2018 Winter Olympics, in parallel giant slalom. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian male snowboarders Category:Olympic snowboarders of Austria Category:Snowboarders at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Universiade medalists in snowboarding Category:Universiade bronze medalists for Austria Category:Competitors at the 2015 Winter Universiade
title: Alexander Payer
